displayData: Any Resident Indian/legal Entity as permitted by RBI.

tabsData.name: features
tabsData.label: Features
displayData: Free Group Personal Accidental Death Insurance Cover*.
Discount on Processing Charges & Rate of Interest in Retail loans*.
Cash Withdrawal Limit upto Rs. 2 lakhs/day & POS transaction limit upto Rs.5 lakhs/day.

sectionContent.htmlData: * As per present regulatory guideline, digital PAN card images /e-PAN Cards are not accepted during Video KYC Calls
We are processing your Video KYC session and will update your Currents Account application once it is finalised. You will receive the latest status on your registered Mobile and Email Id.
This does not take verly long normally.If the application status not updated within 3 working days, please visit your nearest Bank of India branch or contact customer care at

sectionContent.paragraphData: Nomination is a facility that allows an Investor/depositor to designate a person who can stake a claim to the investments, in the event of an unforeseen circumstance. It is highly recommended that you nominate a beneficiary for your hard-earned investments. Most importantly, in such an event, it can save a lot of time, unnecessary procedures and paperwork for your family and loved ones. The best part is that nomination is simple and flexible.

sectionContent.paragraphData: Please fill the mandatory details marked with *

Nomination is a facility that allows an Investor/depositor to designate a person who can stake a claim to the investments, in the event of an unforeseen circumstance. It is highly recommended that you nominate a beneficiary for your hard-earned investments. Most importantly, in such an event, it can save a lot of time, unnecessary procedures and paperwork for your family and loved ones. The best part is that nomination is simple and flexible.
